# id: MessageCodeFormatter -> String format(String errorCode, @Nullable String objectName, @Nullable String field)_
commentText: Build and return a message code consisting of the given fields, usually delimited_by {@link DefaultMessageCodesResolver#CODE_SEPARATOR}._@param errorCode e.g.: "typeMismatch"_@param objectName e.g.: "user"_@param field e.g. "age"_@return concatenated message code, e.g.: "typeMismatch.user.age"_@see DefaultMessageCodesResolver.Format
